Add a goal you want to achieve

string-array.name: lista_consejos
string-array.item: Having a goal is one way to motivate yourself to save money, why not try it?
If you distinguish between need and desire you avoid unnecessary purchases
You can also sell what you no longer use to generate more revenue
Purchase basic clothing, it never goes out of fashion
Manage a budget helps to better organize
If you eat at home, or prepare your food before you save unnecessary spending
Compare prices regularly to consciously choose where you make your purchases
Prioritize your expenses to establish a good budget
Hit the streets with the right money than you need, so avoid compulsive shopping
Sabe your money exchange!
It restricts the use of credit cards
Public transport is cheaper, but it is also more time consuming: take advantage of that time
Applies the rule of 10 seconds! when you see something tempting, stop breathing, and if after 10 seconds there is a strong reason to buy it, keep walking
It is considered exercise at home and save the gym fee
Organizes meetings at home instead of going out, so everyone will save a lot of money
Only 8% of the money exists in physical form, the rest is in electronic form
There are currently about 170 different currencies in the world
The word "salary" has its origins in the Egyptian time
The bill was created in China in the 7th century
The first Mint in America was that of Mexico, founded in 1535
The accounting is more than 5,000 years old, do you hope to learn?
Personal income tax is an English invention, as the war with France was too expensive, so it created the tax income
Investments are considered as liabilities until they generate benefits
The basis of a good economy is having more assets than liabilities
In Mexico only 1% of young people is saving for retirement, and you? already tried the retirement function?
